content: moonnaam shushroosha
(kukkiliyon)

samrakshakanaam naathaa! Devaa-haale...U haale...
Raavum pakalum thirumu-mpil kenen.

Pookatten praarththana nin savidham-haale...U haale...
Shraddhiccheetanamen-yaachanaye.

Thinmaye mohicchennaathmam-haale...U haale...
Ennuyir paathaa-lam pooki.

Kuzhiyil pettore polaayen-haale...U haale...
Thunayattoro-totthen njaan.
baarekmor. Shubaho... Menaolam...
(ekbo-yaummaano)

mruthiyaarnnore!-saubhaagyam
ningalkkuththaana-tthinte naalil
ulkkondoruyirin thirumeyyum
mochanamekum thirurakthamathum
ningale nirttheetum-valabhaage.
saumenkaalosu
(thakkseptho-paulosu aksebu)

paulosezhuthi-mruthi mishihaayil praa-
picchore-maranam-baadhikki-llennevam
mishihaanidraa-vasharaayor veendum
mruthiyelkki-llennud-ghoshicchaan-shaasthreeshan.
moriyo ....
(kolo-kukkoyo)

nukarunnonu katum kaypaa-nee maranakkaa-saa
varika javam pokaamutayon-ninne aaraa-yu-
/tnnennaathmaavo-taa doothan chollum
/tneram paaram-ghoram khedakaram.
Kanneer kavililozhukkikko-ndaathmaavothu-nnu:
shaanthiyotuththaanattholam-thanuve! Nivasi-kka.
/thaale... U haale...

Njaan vydeshikanennevam-chonneetunnaathmam
aal veettutayon vittathinaal nilppaan tharamilla.
/tpreshithanenno-tevam bhaashicchu:
/taalayavaasam-kyvetiyuka, varika
kartthaavaruliya naal vareyum-njaan meviyathaa-kum
mohana nashvaramandirame-vaazhkka shubham me-yye.
/thaale...U haale...
baarekmor. Shubaho ...

dyvasuthaa! Vazhiyaathrayilen-paatheyam nee-yaam
jagatheeposhakane! Pashiyil-neeyenne po-tti.
/tnjaaneriyaruthe-nin thanurudhirangal
/ten thanuveennum-vaasana veeshumpol.
Maamoodeesa enikkortthaal-mungaatthoru nau-ka
naathaa! Nin krupa kaananame-njaanuththaana-tthil.
/thaale... U haale....
menaolam ...

verpaatin velayilaathmam-meyyotura che-yyu-
nnenthupakaaramenikkekum-dhanasampaadya-ngal?
/tvidhinilayatthil-chodikkum sukrutham
/tcheythennaakil-phalamulavaayene.
Vaasasthalavum dhanavum njaanutamastharkke-ki
bheekarasimhaasanasavidham-pokunnene-n്re
haale.... Cheythikalariyippaan.
moriyo ...
(maar apremin്re bovuso)

aardrathayaal naathaa devaa!
Daasannekaname-punyam
nin mahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaa-yivane.

Rakshippaan vannon mashihaa!
Neeyen sanketham-mithram.
Chaavirulil paathaalatthil
nin sleebaayaanan-deepam.

En verpaataasannam njaan
ningalil ninnippo-l neengum.
Verpaatekiya dyvatthe
ortthenne orppin-ningal.

Vathsalare! Shaanthyaa vaazhvin
thaathanmaare! Praarththippin
njaanippol dyvam chollum
sthaanam nokkippo-kunnu.

Elkkuka devaa! Nin sharane
nidrayilaayoraa-thmatthe
nin krupa shobhikkum naalil
nirtthaname valamaa-yivane.

Aardrathayaal naathaa! Devaa!
Daasannekaname-punyam
nin mahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaa-yivane.
